name: Ravanelli Junior
overview: A platform game by Gianluca Sclano. The aim of the game is to be able to save your father (Radanelli Senior) from the clutches of a mysterious kidnapper (Mr X). In this adventure you will have to face an army of Mr. X's henchmen, who have undergone genetic mutations when subjected to dangerous radiation. You will have to search far and wide in all the places where your father has enemies, and defeat the forces of evil present ...
